questions.question: Who is the author of I Am Not Esther?

choices.answer: Kirby Greenland
Fleur Beale
Fleur Beal
Fluer Beele

questions.question: What does Miriam do to get her kicked out of the sect?

choices.answer: Continues to draw pictures
Wants to become a doctor
Wants to change schools
Wants to marry Daniel

questions.question: What does Daniel teach us when he decides not to get married?

choices.answer: That faction comes before blood
That we should always do what our parents say
That it is important to value your family
That personal values can tear families apart

questions.question: How does Kirby repetitively describe Uncle Caleb?

choices.answer: Grey
Old
Cruel
Ugly

questions.question: When does Kirby say the quote "I kept myself busy so I wouldn't think" ?

choices.answer: When she's living with her cousins after she leaves the sect
When she is living with the sect
Before her mum abandons her
In the counsellor's office near the end

questions.question: 'But I think the running can stop now.' What language feature is this?

choices.answer: Personification
Imperative
Metaphor
Personal pronoun

questions.question: Why should adults be honest with their teenagers?

choices.answer: Because it is important to value your personal identity
Because communication is essential in every relationship
Because keeping things from your loved ones causes rifts
Personal values can tear families apart

questions.question: Why is Kirby's name important to her?

choices.answer: It's on her ID card
It begins with a K like the Kardashians
A name is a key part of your identity
She knew why her mum gave it to her

questions.question: What do we learn about parents and teenagers from this book?

choices.answer: That parents need to communicate with teenagers
That parents are trying to protect us
That parents keep things from us like we do to them
That our parents want to control our lives

questions.question: Why is it important to value your personal identity?

choices.answer: Because as a teen, you may be easily influenced to change.
Because you should always conform to your family
It is not important
Because you don't want to be a follower

questions.question: Why does Kirby cut off her hair?

choices.answer: Because the women have braided hair
To show she is not controlled by Uncle Caleb
Because she is sick of it being frizzy
Because men were lusting after her hair

questions.question: Daniel says, “I cannot do anything... My life is planned for me.” This shows...

choices.answer: That Daniel has a say in what happens to him in life
That is is important to have your life planned
That teenagers should follow their parents' careers.
The consequences of extreme religious beliefs

questions.question: Why is communication essential in every relationship?

choices.answer: Being open and honest leads to understanding each other
Parents should tell teens everything about their past
Secrets are no fun. Secrets hurt someone
Teens should be able to confide in and trust their parents

Anglicanism
Exclusive Brethren

choices.answer: Daniel

Esther

questions.question: “I had nightmares about looking in the mirror and having no face.” This supports the idea of:

choices.answer: Identity
The value of identity
Communicating with loves ones
Impact of extreme religion

questions.question: Why are young adults in Exclusive Brethren families not allowed to attend Universities?

choices.answer: It is bad to associate with or become a "worldly"
Because they do not believe in computers
It is evil to gain knowledge
They don't want to educate their women

Write about Kirby
Use both lots of keywords
Learn my practice essays
